src:
Kongres II Partai Nasdem Dilaksanakan 8-11 November 2019
06 Nov 2019, 14:47 by syariful alam


Kongres II Partai Nasdem Dilaksanakan 8-11 November 2019

KBRN, Jakarta : Pelaksanaan Kongres II dan HUT ke-8 Partai Nasdem akan dimulai tanggal 8-11 November 2019 di JI Expo Kemayoran. Kongres akan dihadiri 7000 peserta dengan agenda yang akan dibahas dan kongres ini merupakan ajang tertinggi dalam Parpol termasuk merumuskan kebijakan partai."Dalam rangkaian kongres akan dibahas langkah-langkah strategis partai," kata Ketua Panitia Kongres II Amelia Angraini dalam keterangan pers di DPP Partai Nasdem, Rabu (6/10/2019).Â Dikatakan Amel, sejumlah tokoh nasional, gubernur dan tamu negara akan hadiri Kongres II dan HUT ke-8 Partai Nasdem di JI Expo Kemayoran."Pada penutupan kongres nanti akan dihadiri dan ditutup oleh Presiden Jokowi. Akan hadir juga Wapres KH Maruf Amin dan menteri-menteri jilid kedua," katanya.
text:
The Second Congress of the Nasdem Party will be held November 8-11 2019
Nov 6 2019, 14:47 by syariful alam


The Second Congress of the Nasdem Party will be held November 8-11 2019

KBRN, Jakarta: Implementation of the Second Congress and the 8th Anniversary of the Nasdem Party will begin on 8-11 November 2019 at the JI Expo Kemayoran. The congress will be attended by 7000 participants with the agenda to be discussed and this congress is the highest event in the political party including formulating party policies. "In the series of congresses the party will discuss strategic steps," Chairman of the Congress Committee II Amelia Angraini said in a press statement at the Nasdem Party DPP , Wednesday (6/10/2019). Amel said, a number of national figures, governors and state guests would attend the Second Congress and the 8th Anniversary of the Nasdem Party at the JI Expo Kemayoran. "At the closing of the congress will be attended and closed by President Jokowi. Vice President KH Maruf Amin and the ministers will also attend. the second volume minister, "he said.
